Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cell
public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the single grid element of the board
Author:
Marco Re

    • setHeight

      height's setter it is used when the player wants to build a dome when the actual height isn't a THIRD FLOOR
      Parameters:
      height - is the new height of the cell

    • getDirection

      public Pair getDirection​(Cell secondCell)
      Get the direction between two cell This method return the distance between two cells passed like parameters
      Parameters:
      secondCell - is the cell in which the distance finish
      Returns:
      an array of two integer with the two coordinates x and y

    • cellDistance

      public boolean cellDistance​(Pair cell)
      check if the cell is adjacent to an other
      Parameters:
      cell - the other cell
      Returns:
      true if the cell is adjacent

    • isPerimeter

      public boolean isPerimeter()
      Check if the cell is a perimeter cell
      Returns:
      true if the cell is a perimeter cell, otherwise return false
